outline.annotation:
Order Automation
The goal of this project is to automate the ordering process in xCompany to minimize manual process
Project Manager: Joe Ingles
Business Analyst: John Doe
Developer: Jomari Tenedero
Process Owner: Lebron James

items.annotation: Get the next transaction to be processed.

Retrieve a new transaction data to be processed.
The TransactionNumber variable holds the current transaction number and incrementing this variable makes the framework retrieve the next transaction. If the framework is retrying a failed transaction, this variable is not incremented until the maximum number of retry attempts is reached.

Process a single transaction. 
The result of the processing can be: 1) Success, 2) Business Exception, 3) System Exception. 
In the case of a system exception, the transaction can be automatically retried.
Read configuration file and initialize applications used in the process.

There is no need for any action in case of successful transaction.
The process should simply go to next transaction.

This is a simple mecanism to stop the process.
In reallife scenario you can stop the process when there is no more data to process or on a schedule.
